author: jefft
msg: When comparing the path against book.xml node paths, ignore only the fragment
id, not the whole extension.  This allows filenames with differing extensions
(site.html, site.pdf) to be listed in the same menu.

author: jefft
msg: Add comment showing how to exclude urls

author: jefft
msg: Comment out links to whole-site HTML/PDF, as they would just chew ASF bandwidth for little benefit

author: jefft
msg: Stop links from being included in the aggregate page,
because they cannot be resolved and break the build.
